channel.title: Cybersecurity on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on FinanClub

item.title: S
item.description: score:1044 Chances: SentinelOne (NYSE: S) is helping counteract the increase in cybersecurity threats with its AI technologies. SentinelLabs announced a premier cybersecurity research conference, LABScon 2023. Cybersecurity investment opportunities are significant due to the rising instances of data breaches. Demand for high-performance cybersecurity services is expected to increase as work processes go digital.

item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:1056 Chances: Palantir’s AI platform, launched in April, is gaining traction with over 100 organizations and talks with more than 300 additional companies. Palantir raised its annual revenue forecast and announced a $1 billion stock buyback plan, indicating confidence in its growth prospects.
